original_definition: 'instantaneous FRCE data' means a set of data of the FRCE of a LFC block with a measurement period equal to or shorter than 10 seconds used for system frequency quality evaluation purposes;
generated_definition: 'instantaneous FRCE data' means data on the current electricity frequency in real-time, obtained from the synchronous area's lfc blocks.

Article 3: ‘instantaneous FRCE data’ means a set of data of the FRCE of aLFC blockwith a measurement period equal to or shorter than 10 seconds used forsystem frequency quality evaluation purposes;
‘instantaneous FRCE data’ means a set of data of the FRCE of a LFC block with a measurement period equal to or shorter than 10 seconds used for system frequency quality evaluation purposes;
Article 130: for each LFC block of the synchronous area, the instantaneous FRCE data.
